ygData.subject: Re: Questions??????
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are a human monk, then use the boats between efp and bb to raise skill.  Just keep jumping off the raised part of the boat.  I raised safe fall this way
ygData.messageBody:
If you are a human monk, then use the boats between efp and bb to
raise skill. Just keep jumping off the raised part of the boat. I
raised safe fall this way on two chars back when the boats were the
only free ride between continents.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Robert" <Rengar65@y...> wrote:
> Ok, I'm new to this group and to playing EQ.
>
> My questions may be redundant to those asked by others here or even
> off the wall but her goes.
>
> Does any one use begging?
>
> I have built mine to 23 (not real hi I know but the character is
only
> 9th level) so far all it has done is get me 2 copper and attacked
> twice. Not good odds (one attack per copper).
>
> Why do I have direction sense? And why would you buy a compass?
>
> I have a compass on my screen. I already know what direction I am
> facing. My direction sense is at 200 and it still only works about
> 60% of the time.
>
> As a monk, how do I improve my safe fall skill without spending all
> my points on it?
>
> I keep jumping off tall things and taking damage but no improvement.
>
>
> Why are all the characters white? What if I want to play a black
> person?
>
> Well that's about it for now. I look foreword (because my eyes are
> in the front of my head :P ) to your answers.
>
> Robert
